item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my cyberspace, here you can find stuff I like. A little bit about me: I’m a software developer I’m a game console collector I’m an electronics modder I’m a mechanical watch collector I’m a Linux user I love tinkering If you want to contact me, please send me a message on mastodon!
